oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Uniform coat of Pvt. Henry Edwards Phillips
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: British made U.S. Army uniform coat of Pvt. Henry Edwards Phillips. The interior lower right skirt is marked with broad arrow and "W D" for War Department. The rank of private is visible on the upper right sleeve and his discharge chevron is on the left. A ribbon bar for WWI Victory Medal is attached over the left breast pocket. Phillips was from Oliver Springs, Tennessee. The town limits includes portions of Morgan, Roane, and Anderson Counties.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
